      • findMinAngle

        public static double findMinAngle(double startHeading,
                  double endHeading)
        Find the minimum angle the robot needs to turn to reach the desired heading
        Parameters:
        startHeading -
        endHeading -
        Returns:
        The minimum angle to turn to the endHeading. Positive for CCW. Negative for CW.

      • calculateHeading

        public static double calculateHeading(double currentX,
                      double currentY,
                      double targetX,
                      double targetY)
        Calculates the heading the robot needs to face in order to travel a straight path to target.
        Parameters:
        currentX - - Current x coordinate robot is on
        currentY - - Current y coordinate robot is on
        targetX - - x coordinate of target destination
        targetY - - y coordinate of target destination
        Returns:
        The heading in radians

      • calculateUSLocalizeHeading

        public static double calculateUSLocalizeHeading(double angleA,
                                double angleB,
                                int cornerNumber)
        Calculates the corrected heading for US Localization.

        Assumes the robot is stopped at angleB when this calculation is performed.

        Parameters:
        angleA - - Heading from odometer when detected rising edge while rotating CW.
        angleB - - Heading from odometer when detected rising edge while rotating CCW.
        cornerNumber - - The corner number the robot starts at.
        Returns:
        The corrected heading the robot is at in radians.
